links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: G.f.: 1/(3 - E(0)), where E(k)= 1 + 2^k/(1 - x/(x + 2^k*(k+1)/E(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jul 21 2013a(n) ~ 2*n!/((13-sqrt(13))*(log((sqrt(13)-1)/2))^(n+1)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 13 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
